services.title: Web Software Development
services.description: Complete web applications and software solutions built with modern technologies. From simple websites to complex web platforms, I deliver scalable and maintainable code.

services.title: Automation & AI Integration
services.description: Streamline your business processes with custom automation solutions and AI integrations. From simple scripts to complex AI-powered systems.

services.title: Photo, Video, Banner & Design
services.description: Professional graphic design services including photos, videos, banners, and complete brand identity. Creative solutions that make your brand stand out.
features: UI/UX design for web and mobile

services.title: ERP & Frappe Development
services.description: Comprehensive ERP solutions using Frappe framework and ERPNext. Custom business applications and enterprise resource planning systems.

services.title: School/College Projects
services.description: Custom academic projects and IoT solutions for students and educational institutions. From simple assignments to complex IoT systems with hardware integration.

services.title: IoT, Scripting & Data Science
services.description: Advanced IoT solutions combined with data science capabilities. Custom scripting, data pipelines, filtering, and analysis for intelligent IoT systems.
features: Machine learning for IoT data analysis

pricingNote.title: Pricing Information
pricingNote.description: All prices are base estimates and may vary based on project complexity, specific requirements, and additional features. Final pricing will be discussed after understanding your exact needs.
